00025 typedef struct HALOHEAD
00026 {
00027         ILushort        Id;  // 'AH'
00028         ILshort         Version;
00029         ILshort         Size;
00030         ILbyte          Filetype;
00031         ILbyte          Subtype;
00032         //ILshort       Brdid, Grmode;

00037         ILushort        MaxBlue;
00038         /*ILbyte        Signature[8];
00039         ILbyte          Filler[12];*/
00040         ILbyte          Filler[20];  // Always 0 by PSP 4
00041 } IL_PACKSTRUCT HALOHEAD;
